comments.content: I travel for work and would like to find places to play when I travel. Is there a tool that helps players do this?
Not unless you count playing online as a "place". OCTGN will allow you to play on your computer.

joezim007 said:

Not unless you count playing online as a "place". OCTGN will allow you to play on your computer.



I can play easily at the FFG center here in Roseville, MN. I was just hoping there was a way for me to play elsewhere while on the road.
where do you usually travel? and there is a player finder somewhere on the siteâ€¦at least, i remember searching for ppl in my area before.
